answers.answer: If you have any concerns go to the Emergency room just in case, even if it turns out to be for no REASON , you're better safe than sorry .
I don't know what to think.
Go to L&DMy sister n law is a L&D nurse and she always told me if my feet/hands/face ever get swollen out of no where to go in as soon as possible!Please don't wait to go in ! Be safe!
Yeah my friend said she thought my right hand was swollen but I didn't see it and my face isn't swollen but my gums are.

question: I'm 27 weeks today, I have to go to the doctor Tuesday to check and make sure my high blood pressure is diet control so I was to cut out all sodium, its been hard being everything has sodium!! I did eat bananas and boiled potatoes today so I've done pretty good. Well since like Saturday night or Sunday my foot has been swollen I'm keeping it up while I'm sleeping and its okay when I wake up sore but not swollen and by the end of the night I can't bend my foot, only my right side not the left. They said at my last appointment they're thinking I'm going to have preeclampsia. I'm way too early to HAVE to have my baby!! I keep thinking about it keep crying even while I'm at work. I wanted this for so long and now I'm worried to death. someone else told me I should call the doctor tomorrow....I'm just so scared and nervous I cannot lose my babygirl. what am I suppose to do??? She's still moving like she normally does.
title: please help!!!
